title: The Country Roads Board gazette No. 10
brief_description: Progress report on work of the Country Roads Board; rebuilding the Warrigal Road and the Nepean Highway intersection; new road bridge across the Maribyrnong River at Footscray; construction of a new Air Force air strip; digging storm water drains in the metropolitan areas; maintenance and building of country roads and bridges.
description: Progress report on work of the Country Roads Board; rebuilding the Warrigal Road and the Nepean Highway intersection; new road bridge across the Maribyrnong River at Footscray; construction of a new Air Force air strip; digging storm water drains in the metropolitan areas; maintenance and building of country roads and bridges.
